title: Project Summary
description: Please give me a general overview of your project.

title: About Company or Organization
description: Tell me about your business or organization. History, brand, size, staff and locations will all help me understand what you’re all about. Include a summary on the services or products you provide. Describe your mission. Also include any plans for future growth that might be important for me to be aware of.

title: Target Audience
description: Briefly describe your target audience, including their needs and interests.

title: Goals
description: What do you want to achieve with the website or app?

title: Competitors
description: Who are your main competitors? I can look at what they’re doing right and what they’re doing wrong. Some may have particular areas of interest i.e. key functionality. Which sites/apps have great designs that you like? Take a look at things like layout, color schemes, typography, photography, and unique tools or features. Try providing a list of links with reference notes for each of them.

title: Look & Feel
description: Try to describe the ‘look & feel’ of the new app or site. How much free reign do you want me to have with the design?

title: Logo Design
description: Will you need custom logo design? If so, what preferences do you have for one, such as colors, typography, layout? Try providing links to websites with logos that you like.

title: Features
description: Please list the features and requirements for the new app or website. For example, should it have a blog? An Interactive map? API integration? Push notifications? Send emails? User registrations and logins? Please describe all the features you need this app/website to have.

title: Content
description: Will you be providing new content for the app/website? If so, it's a good idea to plot a rough sitemap in your brief. How many pages will there be in total? What photography, illustrations or graphics, sales copy, descriptions, or other forms of content are currently available?

title: In-house Requirements
description: Describe how the app or website will be managed on a day-to-day basis. How regularly will you be updating and adding content? Will any form of data export be required from the app/website? Other than standard Google Analytics, do you need to gather any more on-going data from the site?

title: Hosting
description: Do you have a hosting plan or plan to purchase a hosting plan for this app/website? Or do you prefer that I take care of the hosting for you at a reasonable fee?

title: Support
description: Will you need ongoing support and maintenance?

title: Target Platforms
description: Types of devices: desktop, smartphones, tablets, or all devices. Any platforms such as Amazon Fire TV?

title: Database Integration
description: Will your website/app need to interact with a database?

title: Backend Development
description: Will you need me to develop a backend such as a web api?

title: Online Marketing
description: Digital marketing is absolutely vital to the success of your new app/website. If you already have marketing plans in place, it can be helpful to summarize them.

title: Deadline
description: Do you have a deadline for this project? Bear in mind that I'm a single developer, not an agency with a team, so if your project has a hard deadline that is fast approaching, I may not be the best choice. Otherwise, knowing your deadline will help me determine if I'm able to deliver your project on time.

title: Measuring Success
description: How will you judge the success of the new app/website? Do you have sales or visitor targets?

title: Budget
description: What is your budget for this project? My minimum fee is $500, but if your budget is less than that I will be happy to try to point you in the right direction. If it's over that, I will try my best to work within your budget.

title: Upload Files
description: Upload any files that you think might clarify your requirements for me. This could be sketches, images, PDFs, Word Docs, etc.
